characterDescription:
The foreigner captain is encountered by Puuli as he scavenges for debris left in the wake of the Everstorm.
Her ruined ship had been rocked in the cove where he lives, struck by lightning, then smashed back against the stones. To him, now only the mast is visible, upon which he compliments her because it was a very nice mast.

characterDetails.Appearance: She has long eyebrows and tan skin.
